channel.title: Operators on REEECode Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Operators on REEECode Docs

item.title: Math
item.description: EWW you do numbers and stuff. Addition: XD+XD Subtraction: XD-XD Division: XD/XD Multiplication: XD*XD Exponent: XD^XD

item.title: Boolean
item.description: Boolean operators working on REEEEE are as follows: BOTH & TRUE if both pass EITHER OF | TRUE with one pass WON OF &| TRUE if x NOT Y NOT TRUE if value isnt that of x

item.title: Comparison
item.description: x NOMY y is greater or equal x MONY y is lesser or equal x NOM y greater x MON y lesser

item.title: Concatenation
item.description: We uWu different variables we want to combine. Ex. “I HAZ” uWu “COOKIES”
